What are the steps in order to put it on a DVD, I mean do you copy the folder or the contents in it to the DVD?

Windows installs and works great, but I haven't gotten a crack to work yet. 

To aljinn99: 
Here's what I did: 
1) Extracted the files from the .iso file into a subdirectory.

2) Started MagicISO

3) Loaded boot image into MagicISO  (included in the torrent in [BOOT] subdirectory).

4) Loaded extracted files into MagicISO.

5) Created bootable .iso image.

6) Burned image to DVD.

MagicISO website has pretty good tutorials for doing the above steps.

Good luck!
